import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { CustomHook } from "../hooks/CustomHook"; import { log, success, error} from "../utils/logs" import { LockClosedIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const Login = () => { const history = useHistory(); const email = CustomHook("email"); const password = CustomHook("password"); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); log("login attempt...") const { data } = axios.post("/api/auth/login", { email: email.value, password: password.value }) console.log(data, "data") setUser(data) success(`logged user ${data.email}`) history.push("/secret") } return (

); }; export default Login;
